original_text: If the ministry that brought condemnation was glorious, how much more glorious is the ministry that brings righteousness!
korean_text: 정죄의 직분도 영광이 있은즉 의의 직분은 영광이 더욱 넘치리라

sentences.original_text: If the ministry that brought condemnation was glorious
how much more glorious is the ministry
